production.heading: Direct Request for Georgia Tech items; plus, DiscoverE has a new style
production.message:
Direct requesting for Georgia Tech items in discoverE is now available. Please contact the Library Service Desk if you need assistance.

You may notice some improvements to the styling of discoverE; basic functionality is the same. Please feel free to leave a comment or report a problem.
